text: Hindu Samhati (Bengali: হিন্দু সংহতি )is a right wing Hindu Nationalist organisation. It has been established to protect Bengali Hindus. Hindu Samhati was founded in 2007 by Tapan Ghosh who was a Pracharak of Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh. It has organisation in every district of West Bengal. It has opened newly units in Assam and Jharkhand.. Its main slogan is "Jai Maa Kali" along with "Jai Shree Ram". The founding head of Hindu Samhati, Tapan Ghosh, breathed his last on 11 july 2020. http://indiafacts.org/tapan-ghosh-a- true-hindu-warrior/ ==References== Category:Hindu nationalism
title: Hindu Samhati
